0.0.2.name: wordpress/amenities-plugin
0.0.2.description:
This plugin was created out of simple necessity for the need to create a bespoke list of amenities for pub, bars and restaurants.

Create your list of available amenities and output via the handy widget.

The plugin can be freely used for listing other items.
